EmailTemplate.description: Used to email notification whenever a Notify Owner Checkbox is checked on Blacklisted Word Object
EmailTemplate.name: Notify Owner Elizabeth Haworth
EmailTemplate.subject: Potential account number posted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello
{!Blacklist_Audit__c.OwnerFullName} just entered a potential account number
Follow this link to view the post {!Blacklist_Audit__c.ChatterURL__c}
Thank you
